DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate survival ASTRA TECH Implant System , OsseoSpeed™ implant follow immediate load extraction socket versus immediate loading heal ridge . Patients need single stand implant replace teeth maxilla within zone 15-25 include follow 5 year . Primary objective implant survival rate 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: Study Compare Survival ASTRA TECH Implant System , OsseoSpeed™ Implants Following Immediate Loading Extraction Sockets Versus Immediate Loading Healed Ridges
DOC.criteria: Provision write informed consent 18 year age A minimum 20 stable intra occlusal contact plan restoration In need single stand implant replace miss / extract / avulse teeth maxilla within zone 15 25 Untreated rampant caries uncontrolled periodontal disease Use smoking tobacco time inclusion History presurgical bone augmentation , within 4 month , plan implant area History extraction without augmentation , within 3 month plan implant area Absence oppose dentition Absence adjacent ( mesial and/or distal ) natural tooth Uncontrolled diabetes Known pregnancy time inclusion Present alcohol drug abuse Any systemic local disease condition would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration Need systemic corticosteroid medication would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration Unable unwilling return followup visit period 5 year Unrealistic esthetical demand Unlikely able comply study procedure accord Investigators judgment Already include study
DOC.keyword: Jaw , Edentulous , Partially ( missing/extracted/avulsed teeth maxilla within zone 15 ( 4 ) -25 ( 13 ) )
